bill.title: Local Government Freight Rail Service Project Revolving Loan Fund; increase bond authorization to fund grants from.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Sections 57-44-7, 57-44-11 And 57-44-19, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase By $3,000,000.00 The Maximum Amount Of Grants That May Be Made To Counties From Money In The Local Governments Freight Rail Service Project Revolving Loan Fund; To Increase By $3,000,000.00 The Amount Of General Obligation Bonds That May Be Issued To Fund Local Government Freight Rail Projects; To Authorize The State Bond Commission To Negotiate The Sale Of Bonds Issued For The Local Governments Freight Rail Service Project Revolving Loan Fund; To Delete The Requirement That Notice Of The Sale Of Bonds For Such Fund Be Published In A Newspaper Or Financial Journal With A Large National Circulation; And For Related Purposes.
